w23b4u5qwp.name: Northpoint City, Lift Lobby B
w23b4u5qwp.directions:
1) Face Poh Kim DVD library at Basement 2, turn left and walk towards the carpark. Enter carpark and head towards C6 parking lot. Musollah will be visible from there.

2) At Basement 1 near Beauty Language and Spectacle Hut, head towards lift lobby B and take travellator down. The musollah will be located beneath the travellator.
w23b4u5qwp.provision: Praying Mats, Telekung, Qiblat Indicator, Air Conditioned
w23b4u5qwp.remarks:
1030 - 2230hrs

Maximum capacity is 4 for jemaah prayers.
